snippet: In the shadow of the Olympic stadium is Hackney, a troubled London borough in which the photographer Zed Nelson grew up, where affluent newcomers live entirely separate from the poor.
abstract: In the shadow of the Olympic stadium is Hackney, a troubled London borough in which the photographer Zed Nelson grew up, where affluent newcomers live entirely separate from the poor.

headline.main: In the Olympics' Shadow, a Tale of Two Cities
